SCTX:
Begin PlagueRock3

short doonce
float timer
short active


if ( GetJournalIndex MS_CrimsonPlague >= 130 )
	if ( MenuMode != 1 )
		if ( doonce == 0 )
			if ( GetStandingPC == 1 )
				set active to 1
				set doonce to 1
				set timer to 0
			endif
		endif
	endif
endif

If ( active == 1 )
	

	if ( timer < 3 )
		move z, -10
		set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
	else		
		set active to 2
		SetPos Z, -620
		set PlagueRock to 1
		PlaySound3D "Disarm Trap"
		Journal MS_CrimsonPlague 140
	endif
endif
End PlagueRock3
